eu.opends.hmi

Class SpeedLimitPresentationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel
      • eu.opends.hmi.SpeedLimitPresentationModel

  • public class SpeedLimitPresentationModel
extends PresentationModel
    This class represents the presentation of a speed limit warning. The distance between the moving car and a speed limit sign is measured in order to update the distance information in the presentation.
    Author:
    Rafael Math

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel

        car, currentRoundedDist, minimumDistance, precisionFactor, previousRoundedDist, targetPosition

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpeedLimitPresentationModel(Car car, com.jme3.math.Vector3f signPosition, java.lang.String speedlimit)
      Initializes a speed limit presentation model by setting the positions of the car and the speed limit sign, the minimum distance from the speed limit sign to cancel the presentation and the value of the speed limit.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long createPresentation()
      Creates a speed limit presentation task on the SIM-TD HMI GUI.
      java.lang.String generateMessage()
      Generates a message containing the speed limit warning and distance to the sign.
      void updatePresentation(long presentationID)
      Updates a speed limit presentation model if the time the car takes to arrive at the speed limit sign has changed or if the distance to it has changed.

      • Methods inherited from class eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel

        computeCurrentParameters, computePreviousParameters, getExactDistanceToTarget, getRoundedDistanceToTarget, getTimeToTarget, hasChangedParameter, setCar, shiftCurrentToPreviousParameters, stopPresentation

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpeedLimitPresentationModel

        public SpeedLimitPresentationModel(Car car,
                           com.jme3.math.Vector3f signPosition,
                           java.lang.String speedlimit)
        Initializes a speed limit presentation model by setting the positions of the car and the speed limit sign, the minimum distance from the speed limit sign to cancel the presentation and the value of the speed limit.
        Parameters:
        car - Car heading towards the speed limit
        signPosition - Position of the speed limit sign
        speedlimit - Value of the speed limit

    • Method Detail

      • createPresentation

        public long createPresentation()
        Creates a speed limit presentation task on the SIM-TD HMI GUI. This data will only be sent to the HMI bundle once.
        Specified by:
        createPresentation in class PresentationModel
        Returns:
        Presentation ID. If an error occurred, a negative value will be returned.

      • updatePresentation

        public void updatePresentation(long presentationID)
        Updates a speed limit presentation model if the time the car takes to arrive at the speed limit sign has changed or if the distance to it has changed.
        Specified by:
        updatePresentation in class PresentationModel

      • generateMessage

        public java.lang.String generateMessage()
        Generates a message containing the speed limit warning and distance to the sign.
        Specified by:
        generateMessage in class PresentationModel
